Crypto Mining Resources

Guides, tools, and resources for cryptocurrency mining enthusiasts.

Mining Resources

We've compiled helpful resources for cryptocurrency mining based on our research and experience.

Mining Calculators

Tools to help you calculate potential mining profitability based on your hardware, electricity costs, and current cryptocurrency prices.

  • WhatToMine
  • CryptoCompare
  • Minerstat
üîß

Mining Software

Popular mining software options for different cryptocurrencies and hardware setups.

  • T-Rex Miner (NVIDIA GPUs)
  • lolMiner (AMD & NVIDIA)
  • TeamRedMiner (AMD GPUs)
üìö

Learning Resources

Educational resources to help you understand cryptocurrency mining concepts and best practices.

  • Mining Hardware Overview (YouTube)
  • How to Build a Mining Rig
  • Mining Communities

Crypto Exchanges

Popular cryptocurrency exchanges where you can trade your mined coins for other cryptocurrencies or fiat currency.

  • Binance
  • Coinbase
  • Kraken
